title: FMS jRPG Music Pack
description: 11 original, high-quality tracks made to add life and emotion to your projects.
longDescription:
Add depth, emotion, personality, and life to your projects with the Fractured Mask Studios jRPG Music Asset Pack.


This asset pack contains 11 original, high-quality tracks for a low price of $4.99 USD. Every track was created in the essence of retro styled rpgs, with the philosophy of providing professional quality music to indie devs for a very affordable price.


Link to video containing short demos of each track in the pack here:


https://youtu.be/YUUMOsj81bU?si=P62Vv3jwIpyrDpKi



If you enjoy this asset pack but want unique music specifically for your game, you can contact us at fracturedmaskstudios@gmail.com. We can work out something that is affordable for you and your project!
technicalDetails:
Track List

  •  Town Theme/Merchant Theme/Overworld Theme (Looped)
  •  Battle Theme (Looped)
  •  Undead Town/Dark Mood Theme (Looped)
  • Rainy Town Theme (Looped)
  • Dwarven Town Theme (Looped)
  • Ice Dungeon Theme (Looped)
  • Fire Dungeon Theme (Looped)
  • Boss Theme/Urgent Mood Theme (Looped)
  • Game Over Melody (Not Looped)
  • Militarized Antagonist Theme (Looped)
  • Final Boss Theme (Looped)

Number of Audio Wavs: 11

Number of Audio Cues: 11

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz/16 bit)

Does music loop: (Yes]

Minutes of audio provided: 21:13

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
